SSG_Tools.RayTools
Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.RayTools.Sphere

public class Sphere
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an infinite sphere by a center point and a radius. Basic intersection and reflection methods for a ray intersecting a sphere are included.

Constructor Summary
Sphere()
          Construct a Sphere of radius 1 at the origin, by default
Sphere(Vector3D center, float radius)
          Construct the Sphere, centered at the specified point and with the specified radius.
 
Method Summary
 float distance(Vector3D a_point)
          Find the distance from the specified point to this Sphere.
 Vector3D getCenter()
          Get the center of this sphere.
 float getRadius()
          Get the current radius of this sphere.
 Vector3D intersect(Ray ray)
          Find the point of intersection of the specified Ray with this sphere.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          Main program with basic tests for the methods of this class.
 Ray reflect(Ray ray)
          Find the reflected ray when the specified ray hits this Sphere.
 void setCenter(Vector3D center)
          Set the center of this sphere to the specified point.
 void setRadius(float radius)
          Set the radius of this sphere to the specified value.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Get a multiline string listing the center and radius that define this sphere.

intersect

public Vector3D intersect(Ray ray)
Find the point of intersection of the specified Ray with this sphere.

Parameters:
ray - The ray for which the intersction with this sphere is calculated.
Returns:
the point of intersection of the Ray with this sphere, or null if the Ray does not intersect the sphere.

reflect

public Ray reflect(Ray ray)
Find the reflected ray when the specified ray hits this Sphere.

Parameters:
ray - The ray for which the reflection from this Sphere is calculated.
Returns:
the reflected Ray.

distance

public float distance(Vector3D a_point)
Find the distance from the specified point to this Sphere. The distance will be negative, zero or positive, depending on whether the point is in, on, or outside of the sphere.

Parameters:
a_point - The point whose distance to the Sphere is calculated.
Returns:
the distance from the point to this Sphere.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Get a multiline string listing the center and radius that define this sphere.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a multiline string giving the center and radius.
